name: Solo on the Battlefield
description:
A solo roleplaying game about documenting fictional dystopian battles and encountering battles that leave you in awe!

Requires a 52 card deck and a six-sided die.

This is a Hack of Alone Among the Stars by Takuma Okada.

Disclaimer:

I do NOT support any real life actions of war and it's conciquences that puts other's lives and families at risk of death or total loss.
